description: React component for game control UI including FEN import/export and move undo/redo actions, with internal state management and interaction with chess logic functions.

classes.name: GameControls
classes.description: React functional component providing game controls such as new game, undo, redo, and FEN import/export.

methods.name: handleImport
methods.description: Handles the import of a FEN string, validating, parsing, and updating the game state.

methods.name: handleExport
methods.description: Copies the current FEN to the clipboard and shows a toast notification.
